mapper.select: select * from (select sd.SCHEDULE_ID, sd.TEACHUSER_ID, tu.user_Name, ce.course_Name as curriculum, sd.curriculumId, sd.START_DATE, sd.END_DATE, sd.WEEK_DAY, ca.Class_Name from TF_EL_SCHEDULE sd, TF_EL_COURSE ce,TF_EL_CLASS ca, TF_EL_TEACH_USER tu where sd.CURRICULUMID = ce.course_Id and sd.CLASSID = ca.Class_Id and sd.TEACHUSER_ID = tu.user_Id and sd.TEACHUSER_ID = #{userId} union all select sd.SCHEDULE_ID, sd.TEACHUSER_ID, tu.user_Name, vi.video_name as curriculum, sd.curriculumId, sd.START_DATE, sd.END_DATE, sd.WEEK_DAY, ca.Class_Name from TF_EL_SCHEDULE sd, tf_el_video vi,TF_EL_CLASS ca, TF_EL_TEACH_USER tu where sd.CURRICULUMID = vi.video_id and sd.CLASSID = ca.Class_Id and sd.TEACHUSER_ID = tu.user_Id and sd.TEACHUSER_ID = #{userId}) sd order by sd.WEEK_DAY,to_date(sd.start_date,'hh24:mi')
mapper.insert: insert into TF_EL_SCHEDULE ( SCHEDULE_ID, TEACHUSER_ID, CURRICULUMID, START_DATE, END_DATE, WEEK_DAY, CLASSID ) values ( SEQ_EL_SCHEDULE.nextval, #{teachUserId}, #{curriculumId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{weekDay}, #{classId} )
mapper.update: update tf_el_schedule t set t.WEEK_DAY = #{weekDay}, t.CURRICULUMID = #{curriculumId}, t.START_DATE = #{startDate}, t.END_DATE = #{endDate}, t.CLASSID = #{classId} where t.SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId}
mapper.select: select t.classid,tc.class_name from TF_EL_SCHEDULE t,tf_el_class tc where t.classid = tc.class_id and t.teachuser_id = #{userId} group by t.classid, tc.class_name
select tc.class_id, tc.class_name from user_course_rela re, tf_el_class tc where tc.class_id = re.class_id and re.user_id = #{userId} group by tc.class_id, tc.class_name
